titles: The application of redemption by the effectual work of the word, and spirit of Christ, for the bringing home of lost sinners to God ... by that faithful and known servant of Christ, Mr. Thomas Hooker ...
author: Hooker, Thomas, 1586-1647.
notes: The ninth and tenth books have special t.p.
Advertisements: p. [41]-[44] at beginning and p. [30]-[36] at end.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
